languages.text:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.
languages.original_text:
Восстанавливает 15% от максимального {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} за каждый ранг {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждения{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g}. Исцеляет все {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранения{/g}.
Снимает негативные эффекты: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g}, горение, кровотечение, утомление, тревожность, замешательство, ослепление, ошеломление, замедление, пси-подавление, оглушение, обездвиживание, неспособность атаковать, психосоматическую травму и опрокидывание.

traits.locale_text:
Restores 15% of maximum wounds per rank of the user's Conviction — Benevolentia. Removes all injuries.
Removes toxin, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.

traits.locale_text:
Восстанавливает 15% от максимального здоровья за каждый ранг убеждения Благодеяние. Исцеляет все ранения.
Снимает негативные эффекты: отравление, горение, кровотечение, утомление, тревожность, замешательство, ослепление, ошеломление, замедление, пси-подавление, оглушение, обездвиживание, неспособность атаковать, психосоматическую травму и опрокидывание.

Восстанавливает 15% от максимального здоровья за каждый ранг убеждения Благодеяние. Исцеляет все ранения.
Снимает негативные эффекты: отравление, горение, кровотечение, утомление, тревожность, замешательство, ослепление, ошеломление, замедление, пси-подавление, оглушение, обездвиживание, неспособность атаковать, психосоматическую травму и опрокидывание.

languages.text:
使用者每拥有1级自由主义{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g}，就会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的15%。移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。
移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}，包括{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}灵能抑制{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}精神创伤{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — Iconoclast. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}psy dampening{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}cannot attack{/g}, psychosomatic {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
使用者每拥有1级“人道主义”信念，就会恢复最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的15%。移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}。
移除所有{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}负面效果{/g}，包括{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、灵能抑制、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、无法攻击、精神创伤、与{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}{/g}

languages.text:
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} — 革新主義のランクごとに、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を15%回復する。すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}傷{/g}を取り除く。
{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}妨害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}超能力減衰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}、心因性{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}を取り除き、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}ネガティブ効果{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}する。
languages.original_text:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.

traits.locale_text:
使用者の信念 — ベネボレンティアのランクごとに、最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を15%回復。すべての{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}怪我{/g}を回復。
さらに、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}妨害{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}、超能力減衰、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、攻撃不可、心因性{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}を回復し、{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}ネガティブ効果{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}させる。

languages.text:
Restaura el 15 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas por cada rango de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g} del usuario. Elimina todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}.
También elimina los efectos negativos siguientes: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}amortiguación psíquica{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} psicosomática y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.

traits.locale_text:
Restaura el 15 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} máximas por cada rango de Convicción: Benevolentia del usuario. Elimina todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesiones{/g}.
También elimina los {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}efectos negativos{/g} siguientes: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, amortiguación psíquica, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, no puede atacar, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} psicosomática, y {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}.

languages.text:
Stellt pro "{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} — Ikonoklast"-Rang des Nutzers 15 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} wieder her. Entfernt sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}.
Entfernt folgende {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CalmedWarpEffect}Psidämpfer{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Angriff unmöglich{/g}, Psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.

traits.locale_text:
Stellt 15 % der maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} pro Überzeugungsrang des Nutzers wieder her — Benevolentia. Entfernt sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzungen{/g}.
Removes folgende {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}negative Effekte{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g}, Psi-Dämpfung, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Betäubt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Gelähmt{/g}, Angriff unmöglich, Psychosomatisches {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}.

languages.text:
Rétablit 15 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum par rang de {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g} de l'utilisateur. Supprime toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g}.
Supprime les effets négatifs {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, Combustion, Saignement, Fatigue, Perturbation, Perplexité, Aveuglement, Sidération, Ralentissement, Affaiblissement psy, Étourdissement, Immobilisation, Attaque impossible, Traumatisme psychosomatique et Paralysie.

Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.

traits.locale_text:
Rétablit 15 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} maximum par rang de la Conviction — Benevolentia de l'utilisateur. Supprime toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésions{/g}.
Supprime les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffect}effets négatifs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, Affaiblissement Psy, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, Attaque Impossible, {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g} Psychosomatique et {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}.

languages.text:
Kullanıcının her {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} kademesi için maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanının %15'ini tazeler. Tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlıkları{/g} ortadan kaldırır.
{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toksin{/g}, yanma, kanama, yorgunluk, kaygı, şaşkınlık, körleşme, afallama, yavaşlama, ruhsezi körelmesi, sersemlik, felç, saldıramama, ruhsezi travması ve yere devrilme olumsuz etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.

Restores 15% of maximum {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} per rank of the user's {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}. Removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injuries{/g}.
Removes {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g}, burning, bleeding, fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, psy dampening, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, psychosomatic trauma, and prone negative effects.
